title: Can you download music on Google Play Music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can, if u re using google play music and want to download songs to your . Even you can save music to your SD card, but you can not transfer it from your SD card to another device
Just open the app turn off the downloaded only option and search for your song . Although you can only listen online , to download it offline you need to have the subscription

You can get the same song in you tube .from you tube you can download before that you should download a app named vedioder after downloading that app.you go to that app and click on share and you can get the option of vedioder too so ,click on that you download by that process………
